name: Pagination
description: Pagination is a component for switching between pages

properties.name: pageCount
properties.label: Page Count
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the count of pages.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the count of pages

properties.name: siblingCount
properties.label: Sibling Count
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine how many digits to display either side of current page.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine how many digits to display either side of current page

properties.name: variant
properties.label: Variant
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the variant of pagination style

properties.name: size
properties.label: Size
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the size for pagination

properties.name: isNextButtonVisible
properties.label: Next Button
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the visible or not visible "Next" button

properties.name: isPrevButtonVisible
properties.label: Previous Button
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the visible or not visible "Previous" button

properties.name: isFirstPageButtonVisible
properties.label: First Page Button
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the visible or not visible "First Page" button

properties.name: isLastPageButtonVisible
properties.label: Last Page Button
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the visible or not visible "Last Page" button

eventHandlers.name: onMounted
eventHandlers.label: On Mounted
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered immediately after the component is mounted and appeared on the page.

eventHandlers.name: onUnmount
eventHandlers.label: On Before Unmount
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered immediately before the component is unmounted and destroyed. Perform any necessary cleanup in this method, such as invalidating timers or cleaning up any RT subscriptions that were created in this component.

eventHandlers.name: onPageChange
eventHandlers.label: On Page Change
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This handler is triggered when the current page changes.

eventHandlers.name: onGoNext
eventHandlers.label: On Next Button Click
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This handler is triggered when the user clicks on next button.

eventHandlers.name: onGoBack
eventHandlers.label: On Back Button Click
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This handler is triggered when the user clicks on back button.

eventHandlers.name: onGoFirst
eventHandlers.label: On First Button Click
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This handler is triggered when the user clicks on first-page button.

eventHandlers.name: onGoLast
eventHandlers.label: On Last Button Click
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This handler is triggered when the user clicks on last-page button.
